snippet.title: Monument [Global Update]
snippet.description:
This happened! The game is completely rewritten from scratch. Meet a brand new game with Improve game performance. What's new:

- The game is completely rewritten from scratch
- Improve game performance
- Gameplay has become faster

- TELEPORT GUN
You can teleport anywhere on the map, just shoot at the right place

- NEW MAPS
All maps made from scratch

- STRAFE JUMP
like a defrag mode in quake

- NEW WEAPONS
All weapons made from scratch

- DONAR STATION
You can get ammunition for your health

I hope you will like it. Have a nice game. GL & HF !

You can play here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/376730/Monument/
